text: She ’ s doing just fine! Olivia Munn has landed a new gig hosting the Critics ’ Choice Awards 2018 amid reports that her ex - boyfriend Aaron Rodgers has moved on with Danica Patrick. The X - Men : Apocalypse actress, 37, will lead the star - studded event on Thursday, January 11, at Barker Hanger in Santa Monica, California. “ We are absolutely thrilled to have Olivia hosting this year ’ s ceremony, and know that she will deliver an entertaining and sharp - witted evening to everyone in the room, and the viewers at home, ” Broadcast Film Critics Association president Joey Berlin said in a statement. “ Beyond her skills as an actress, Olivia ’ s work as an activist within the industry gives her a powerful voice, making her the perfect candidate to lead this night honoring the best and brightest in film
